item.description:
Chris and Ron came up with a great idea for a hike...we will hold this event at Mt Wachusette...detailsl will follow.

Ron M will be heading up this event as I will be unable to make is Sat.

If you would like to car pool we will be meeting at Price Chopper on E. Mountain St. (north side of Worcester), right near the sign, at about
10 or 10:30 would be better. It's easy on & off 190 from there. We can carpool, and be at the Mtn ranger station at 11 to meet anyone else.

Hope you guys have fun wish I could go..

Nancy
item.name: Lets get outside for some air
